text:
Ref. No.: 1070/Acad./2025
Date : 23.12.2025
NOTICE
Honours Degree Course Selection
B.Tech. Third Year & Final Year students who are enrolled in Honours degree program have to register
for courses in the EVEN Semester 2025-26. Honours degree courses should be chosen from the
department in which the student enrolled. Students can fill the attached course selection form and
forward by respective Head of the Department latest by 06-01-2026.
(Nand Kishore)
Assistant Dean, Academic Affairs
Honours Degree Course Selection Form Even Sem (2025-26)
